channel.title: Making with Max
channel.description: Recent content on Making with Max

item.title: General Tso's Chicken
item.description: General Tso’s Chicken Ingredients Chicken 1 1/2 lbs chken thighs 1 cup all purpose flour 1 cup cornstarch 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 3 Tbsp marinade Chicken Marinade 2 egg whites 3 tbsp dark soy sauce 3 tbsp chinese cooking wine 3 tbsp vodka 1/4 tsp baking soda

item.title: Ginger-Garlic-Carrot Sauce Cabbage
item.description: Ginger-Garlic-Carrot Sauce Cabbage Ingredients Sauce 1 inch ginger, peeled 1 clove garlic 1/4 carrot, peeled 1/4 lemon, zest only 20g Kewpie mayo 5g rice wine vinegar 5g soy sauce (to taste) 5g sriracha Cabbage Quarter green cabbage, sliced very thin Methodology Using micro grater, grate ginger, garlic, and carrot into bowl.

item.title: Orange Chicken
item.description: Orange Chicken Ingredients Basic Tempura Chicken 3/4 cup cornstarch 1 1/2 cup all-purpose flour 1 egg 1 cup + 2 tbsp water 1/4 cup vodka 2 tsp salt 1 1/2 lb boneless and skinless chicken thighs 72 oz peanut oil Basic Orange Sauce Oleo Saccharum 6 Oranges 1 cup sugar

item.title: Tonkatsu
item.description: Tonkatsu Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 10 minutes 10 minutes 5 Min 25 minutes Ingredients Fried Pork Cutlets 2 boneless pork chops 3/4" / 2cm thick Salt 50g plain flour 25g cornstarch 2 eggs, beaten 50g pnako bread crumbs Peanut oil (or vegetable) for frying

item.title: Tonkatsu Sauce
item.description: Tonkatsu Sauce Ingredients 1 Tbsp ketchup 2 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce 1 1/2 tsp oyster sauce (or soy sauce) 1 1/8 tsp sugar Methodology Combine in small bowl and whisk. Source

item.title: 00 Pizza Dough
item.description: Quick Pizza Dough Ingredients 153g 00 flour 153g All-purpose flour 200g water 8g sea salt 2g active dry yeast 4g Olive Oil Methodology Combine water, yeast and olive oil in a small bowl. Leave for 5 minutes. Combine flour and salt, and mix in water mixture. Knead the dough for 3 minutes.

item.title: Old Fashioned
item.description: Old Fashioned Boubon glass 60ml (Double) Bourbon 1 Maraschino Cherry Simple Syrup (alternatively, Maraschino syrup) to taste Large square ice cube

item.title: Pizza Sauce
item.description: Pizza Sauce Ingredients 1 (28-ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil 1 tablespoon unsalted butter 2 medium cloves garlic, grated on microplane grater (about 2 teaspoons) 1 teaspoon dried oregano Pinch red pepper flakes Kosher salt 2 (6-inch) sprigs fresh basil with leaves attached 1 medium yellow onion, peeled and split in half

item.title: Quick Pizza Dough
item.description: Quick Pizza Dough Ingredients 525g cold water 7g fresh yeast 80g sourdough starter 700g KA bread flour (12+% protein), Alternatively, subsititue 150g with artisanal flour. 14g kosher or sea salt Methodology In a stand mixer bowl, add the cold water, yeast, and sourdough starter (Starter is optional - mostly for flavor). Crumble fresh yeast and distribute that and starter in water.

item.title: 48 Hour Focaccia
item.description: Focaccia Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 20 minutes 20 minutes 1 hour 20 minutes 2 hours Ingredients Focaccia Methodology Source: source1 Ingrdients Focaccia 1 whole head garlic 5 tablespoons (75ml) extra-virgin olive oil, divided Kosher salt, for seasoning 500g all-purpose or bread flour (17 1/2 ounces; about 3 1/4 cups)

item.title: Bagels
item.description: Bagels Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 20 minutes 20 minutes 1 hour 20 minutes 2 hours Ingredients Bagels 6 g active dry yeast 19 g granulated sugar 300 ml warm water (Â± 60 ml) 440 g bread flour (60g of kneading) 6 g salt 17g diastatic malt powder
